info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 2:10PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jackson County through 300 PM PDT... At 210 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hyatt Lake Campground, or 10 miles east of Ashland, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ashland, Talent, Mount Ashland Snow Park, Emigrant Lake, Hyatt Lake Campground, Grouse Gap Snow Park, Howard Prairie Recreation Area and Buck Prairie Nordic Trails. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
